insert into sub_catagory
id,
catagory_id,
sub_catagory_name,
sub_catagory_desc,
display_order,

mapper.update:
update sub_catagory

sub_catagory_name = #{subCatagoryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sub_catagory_desc = #{subCatagoryDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select
from sub_catagory where catagory_id = #{id} order by display_order desc
